underlying_goal: To create a calendar-driven focus system that programmatically configures macOS focus tools (Cold Turkey Micromanager/Blocker) based on calendar events.
primary_success: Proposing and architecting a robust calendar-driven focus system by integrating multiple user requirements and technical possibilities, then guiding the user through the necessary API setup.
brief_summary: The user wanted to programmatically schedule focus sessions. Claude explored options for Cold Turkey Micromanager and Blocker, eventually designing a calendar-driven system. The session progressed through several technical options for calendar access (icalBuddy, AppleScript, Shortcuts, Google Calendar API), with the user settling on the GCal API and getting guidance on setting up credentials.
